H1.text: who did cam newton sign with. Los Angeles Chargers

H3.text: who did cam newton sign with. Carolina Panthers

A4.text: After nearly three months in free agency, Newton signed a one-year deal with the New England Patriots on July 8, 2020.

A5.text: On November 11, 2021, Newton signed a one-year deal worth up to $10 million to return to the Panthers

A6.text: To replace him, the Patriots signed veteran quarterback Cam Newton.
